Interface StreamingSensorListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Main, StreamingSensor
public interface StreamingSensorListener

This interface is implemented by all objects that are able to receive a stream of measurement values.

Method Summary
 void processMeasurement(int value)
          StreamingSensor objects deliver a stream of values to interested objects by passing each value to the object's processMeasurement method.
 

Method Detail

processMeasurement

public void processMeasurement(int value)
StreamingSensor objects deliver a stream of values to interested objects by passing each value to the object's processMeasurement method. The delivery of values is done using its own thread and is asynchronous of everyting else.
Parameters:
value - The measurement value being delivered.
